name: Slash
headline: On a mission to become the largest commercial issuer in America
description:
Slash is on a mission to become the largest commercial issuer in America. 

We offer businesses:
1. Deposit accounts with free outgoing wire and ACH transfers. 
2. Corporate cards with up to 2% cash back, virtual cards, fine grain spend controls, and controls/automation to save hours of work.
3. Integrations to all major accounting platforms.
4. Detailed spend, income, and other financial analytics.
markdown:

Slash empowers you with flexible deposit accounts and virtual cards*, high rewards and low fees, detailed financial insights, and access to up to $200m in FDIC insurance**
[Talk to Sales](https://www.joinslash.com/</contact-sales>)

## Products
Manage all spend and cash with Slash
Efficiently manage your banking and financial operations from a single dashboard.
### [Business CheckingFree domestic wires ACH transfers for Pro and Elite users. Up to $200m in FDIC insurance**. Auto transfers, multi-step approvals for outgoing payments, and integrations with QBO, Xero, and Plaid.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6495ceca45315d552979391b/6495ceca45315d5529793985_arrow.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6495ceca45315d552979391b/6495ceca45315d5529793985_arrow.svg)](https://www.joinslash.com/</products/business-checking>)
### [Corporate Credit CardsUp to 2% cashback for Pro and Elite users, unlimited virtual and physical cards for employees, no minimum balance, and controls and automation to save hours of work.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6495ceca45315d552979391b/6495ceca45315d5529793985_arrow.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6495ceca45315d552979391b/6495ceca45315d5529793985_arrow.svg)](https://www.joinslash.com/</products/corporate-cards>)
### [ReportingGet a macro view of expenses on cards, ACH, and wire payments on a single dashboard. Slice your spend activity by vendor, payment method, card group, or ACH/wire counterparty.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6495ceca45315d552979391b/6495ceca45315d5529793985_arrow.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6495ceca45315d552979391b/6495ceca45315d5529793985_arrow.svg)](https://www.joinslash.com/</products/reporting>)
### [Under 18 EntreprenuersWe offer a special account designed for under-18! With Slash, young entrepreneurs can learn how to manage their finances and grow their businesses.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6495ceca45315d552979391b/6495ceca45315d5529793985_arrow.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6495ceca45315d552979391b/6495ceca45315d5529793985_arrow.svg)](https://www.joinslash.com/</products/slash-for-18-entrepreneurs>)
### [IncorporationStart your LLC or C Corporation with Slash today for $200 + state fees.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6495ceca45315d552979391b/6495ceca45315d5529793985_arrow.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6495ceca45315d552979391b/6495ceca45315d5529793985_arrow.svg)](https://www.joinslash.com/</products/incorporation>)

## Frequently Asked Questions
### What is Slash?
Slash is a modern banking platform designed for high spend businesses. We offer a range of products and features, including virtual cards, unlimited 2% cashback, and enhanced FDIC insurance, all designed to help online businesses thrive.
### Is there a limit to how much cashback I can earn?
No, there is no limit to the amount of cashback you can earn.
### Are there any account fees with Slash?
We offer pricing tiers to suit any business need, starting at $0. 
### Why should I use Slash?
Because Slash offers you way more than a traditional bank. Among other things, you can seamlessly send wire and ACH transfers, generate dozens of virtual cards for employees, and automatically get fine grain analytics on all your spend. Our dashboard is also lightning fast and ultra modern. 
### Is Slash safe?
Yes, your money is safe with Slash. Deposits are insured by the FDIC through Piermont Bank, Member FDIC and Column NA, Member FDIC. Additionally, our team of experts is available 24/7 to help you with any questions or concerns you may have.

generated_description:
### Overview of Slash

**Company Name:** Slash  
**Founded:** 2020  
**Location:** San Francisco, CA  
**Team Size:** 25 employees  
**Funding:** Part of Y Combinator S21  
**Key Partner:** Brad Flora  

**Website:** [joinSlash.com](https://www.joinslash.com/)  

---

### Mission

Slash is on a clear and ambitious mission: to become the largest commercial issuer in America. It aims to empower businesses with a suite of financial tools designed for efficiency and growth.

---

### Product Offerings

Slash provides a robust financial platform tailored for businesses, including:

1. **Deposit Accounts**: Businesses can enjoy free outgoing wire and ACH transfers with access to up to $200 million in FDIC insurance.
2. **Corporate Cards**: These cards offer up to 2% cash back, unlimited virtual cards, and fine-grain spend controls, simplifying expense management.
3. **Integrations**: Seamlessly connects to major accounting platforms like QuickBooks Online (QBO), Xero, and Plaid.
4. **Financial Analytics**: Detailed dashboards provide insights across spending, income, and overall financial health.

Slash even offers unique accounts for aspiring entrepreneurs under the age of 18, helping them learn how to manage their finances.

---

### Financial Metrics

- **Annual Customer Spend**: Over $1 billion on Slash issued cards.
- **Transactions Processed**: $2 billion.
- **Virtual Cards Issued**: Over 4 million.
- **Customer Base**: More than 1,000 happy customers.
- **Customer Support**: Average initial response time to support inquiries is under 3 minutes.

---

### Company Positioning

Slash positions itself distinctly in the fintech space, focusing on businesses that demand flexibility and efficiency from their financial tools. Unlike traditional banks, Slash combines modern technology with sophisticated financial functionality to serve its clients better.

With no caps on cash back earning potential and a variety of pricing tiers starting at zero dollars, Slash appeals broadly to diverse business needs. They're not a bank, but they deliver banking-like services with a fintech twist—high rewards for low fees.

---

### Safety and Security

Customer funds are insured through reputable banking partners, ensuring safety with the backing of the FDIC. Plus, Slash's team is available around the clock, providing peace of mind for users.

---

In summary, Slash is an ambitious fintech startup revolutionizing how businesses manage their finances, offering innovative solutions that drive efficiency and support growth. With a commitment to providing powerful banking tools tailored for ambitious companies, they certainly stand out in the competitive landscape of financial services.
